article: leader of indian opposition unk janata party lal krishna advani will visit pakistan from may ## at the invitation of foreign minister khurshid mahmood kasuri , pakistani foreign office spokesman jalil abbas jilani said here monday .
abstract: indian opposition leader to visit pakistan
